indications: Scrofula, hemorrhoids, recurrent dysentery and asthma with Cold Phlegm

action.primary: Kills parasites and erodes sores topically

indications: Non-healing ulcers, tinea, sores, syphilis and ulcerative gingivitis

contraindications: It is highly toxic, so be very careful for Internal use.

notes: The use of this substance is forbidden.
If taken orally, it must be decocted with Semen Phaseoli Radiati #{LuDou} Lu Dou or bean curd before administration and the dosage should be limited to a safe level.
This substance is a toxin which collapses and deteriorates ulcerous cells and kills malignant cells.
This herb corrodes carbuncles and deep-rooted carbuncles and is poisonous to insects animals and humans.
To treat anal fistulas fry and grind this substance into a powder, wrap in thin paper and insert into the anus. Treat only one anal fistula at a time.
